description.short: The Sample Margarita is one of the most popular recipes.
description.long: The Sample Margarita is a popular recipe. First discovered by Steve Smith in 1910, it has survived the test of time and is sold in bars worldwide.

instructions.text: If using salt, place in a shallow dish. Moisten the rim of a rocks glass with a dampened paper towel, then dip in salt.
Fill the glass with ice; add tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau; and stir a few times until chilled. Serve immediately.
